div.h3: Featured Topic: The new Checkmk Cloud
div.p: Checkmk Cloud is the SaaS platform designed for hybrid IT infrastructure monitoring, empowering maintenance-free operations, effortless setup, and seamless cloud-to-edge visibility.

Checkmk Cloud is the latest offering from Checkmk.
Focus on monitoring, not operating Checkmk. Experience an always up-to-date Checkmk, with the latest features and security patches and much more.

div.h3: A secure architecture you can trust
div.p: Checkmk Cloud comes with security built-in:

- TLS encryption for data in transit and AES-256 encryption for data at rest
- Monitoring and configuration data stay in your jurisdiction in the EU or US
- ISO 27001 certified (in progress)
